author: pan_ilford
post_text: November 3, 2018 at 7:35 AM#1I would like to have a macro performing selfix on actual cue in active sequence. Can it be done with selecting all values, cue only values and tracked values?thx

posts.author: pan_ilford
posts.post_text: November 3, 2018 at 7:35 AM#1I would like to have a macro performing selfix on actual cue in active sequence. Can it be done with selecting all values, cue only values and tracked values?thx

posts.author: gralf
posts.post_text: November 3, 2018 at 4:12 PM#2There is a global variable called $selectedexeccue. This gives you the cue-number of the selected executor.A "cue $selectedececcue please" should select all fixtures in the current cue of the selected executor.Gralf

title: selfix
